description: BaseScheduler.weigh_hosts() is supposed to return one host per instance to be booted, but instead only returns a weighted list of the hosts.  This means that a request for 10 instances in a zone with 2 compute nodes will only result in 2 instances booted, when all 10 could be booted.
title: BaseScheduler.weigh_hosts() doesn't return enough hosts
